text: Hotel for Dogs (1971) is a children's novel by Lois Duncan. It was made into a movie of the same name by DreamWorks Pictures. When the book was originally released in 1971, Andi's name was Liz, and Friday's name was Sadie. The book was re-released December 1, 2008, to promote the movie with the names changed. Two sequels were released: News for Dogs in 2009 and Movie for Dogs in 2010. Category:1971 books Category:20th-century American novels Category:American children's books
